Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Southbound Reroute near 53rd/Ellis
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th and Ellis: due to, street blockage near 53rd/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th and Ellis: due to, street blockage near 53rd/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown and Purple Line Service Delayed at Sedgwick
ShortDescription: Brown and Purple Line trains are standing near Sedgwick due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: Loop-bound Brown and Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing near Sedgwick due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Kimball-bound Brown & Loop-bound Purple Line trains are running, but not stopping at Sedgwick.

Shuttle buses are available between Southport and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #37 Sedgwick

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
